features: Available in capacities up to 5TB that can hold up to 125 games, so that you can save old favorites and still have room for new titles (As used for storage capacity, one terabyte (TB) = one trillion bytes. Total accessible capacity varies depending on operating environment. Number of games based on a 36GB average per game. Comes with an 18-inch (457mm) USB Type-A to Micro-B cable with SuperSpeed interface up to 5Gbps (Cable length may vary.)
Compatible with Xbox Series X/S (play and store Xbox One games, archive Xbox Series X and Xbox Series S games) and PlayStation 5 (play and store PS4 games, archive PS5 games) consoles
Portable form factor with sleek metal top covering that provides fast access to your growing game library
Premium HDD with 3-year limited warranty, purpose-built for gamers based on WD_BLACK quality and reliability
body.description: Everything that goes into WD_Black devices are specifically designed to take your game further, no matter what you play. With speeds up to 140MB/s and up to 5TB of extra storage, the WD_Black P10 Game Drive will push your console or PC to new levels of performance, allowing you to drive your game and play without limits. (Based on read speed and internal testing. As used for transfer rate, megabyte per second (MB/s) = one million bytes per second. Performance will vary depending on your hardware and software components and configurations.).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LEAVE NO GAME BEHIND WITH THE WD_BLACK P10 GAME DRIVE Play games from wherever you are with the portable WD_BLACK P10 Game Drive. This premium external HDD gives you up to 5TB[1] of additional capacity to store up to 125 games[3].

WHEREVER YOU GO, YOUR GAMES FOLLOW Take your game library on the go with the WD_BLACK P10 Game Drive's portable form factor, complete with a sleek metal top covering. Simply unpack and unleash the games in your coveted collection[4]. HIGH-GRADE TECH Step up your game with the WD_BLACK P10 Game Drive, featuring our high-performing HDD platform technology, reaching up to 130MB/s[2] and gives your console or PC the performance boost it needs. NEXT LEVEL STORAGE FOR NEXT-GEN CONSOLES The P10 Game Drive is compatible with next-gen consoles, Xbox Series X|S (play and store Xbox One games/archive Xbox Series X|S games) or PlayStation 5 (play and store PS4 games/archive PS5 games). CONQUER WITH CONFIDENCE Gamers can trust WD_BLACK drives with all their extra lives. You can be certain that your WD_BLACK P10 Game Drive will have your back as you continue your quest to victory.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expand Your Gaming Library with Ease"
reviews.reviewText: The WD_BLACK 5TB P10 Game Drive is a gaming enthusiast's dream come true, offering a massive storage capacity in a portable and rugged external hard drive. Designed for gamers who never want to run out of space, this drive is compatible with PlayStation, Xbox, PC, and Mac, making it a versatile choice for all your gaming needs.The standout feature of this game drive is its colossal 5TB storage capacity. With today's games getting larger and larger in size, having ample storage is crucial. This drive not only accommodates your current library but also provides room for future game releases, expansions, and downloadable content. You can say goodbye to the frustration of having to delete games to make space for new ones.Compatibility is another strong suit of the WD_BLACK P10. Whether you're a PlayStation, Xbox, PC, or Mac gamer, this drive has you covered. It's easy to set up and works seamlessly with your chosen platform, allowing you to transfer and play games effortlessly.The rugged design of the drive is built to withstand the demands of gaming on the go. It's portable and compact, making it ideal for taking your game library to a friend's house or simply freeing up space on your console or computer. The all-black aesthetic gives it a sleek and modern look.Performance-wise, this drive delivers fast data transfer speeds, ensuring that your games load quickly and run smoothly. It's powered by USB 3.2 Gen 1 technology, providing reliable and efficient performance.In summary, the WD_BLACK 5TB P10 Game Drive is a game-changer for gamers who demand storage space and versatility. Its massive capacity, compatibility with multiple platforms, rugged design, and fast performance make it an essential addition to your gaming setup. Say hello to a vast game library and bid farewell to storage woes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You can't go wrong with Western Digital
reviews.reviewText: First, I build and repair a lot of computers and electronics for family and friends. I ALWAYS use Western Digital drives when building or replacing a hard drive. I usually use the "Black" series of drives for performance, durability, and the warranty. These drives last well past their warranties with decent performance for a conventional platter drive. These are the ones to use when you need a large capacity conventional hard drive.I purchased this 5TB gaming external drive to expand the capacity of my PS4. For the first time, I've gone all digital with my PS4 games to reduce the number of game cases and disks around. I also like to have all of the games available without re-downloading, so this makes digital storage capacity at the console critical for me.Hooking up this drive, formatting it, and moving games over from the internal PS4 HD was much easier than I had anticipated. Downloading games from PSN to the external hard drive is also seamless. Running games directly from the portable drive through the USB 3.0 connection doesn't seem to be any slower than launching them from the internal hard drive, at least I haven't noticed any difference in the load times by subjective evaluation. When running continuously, like during a game transfers, the drive gets warm but doesn't seem to get hot enough where I would be concerned.The only major down side to this drive, and it's a flaw with most of the 2.5" based WD portable drives, is that they put the drive's activity light right next to the USB cable connection. I have the drive stacked on top of my PS4 so that i can see the light flash whenever it's reading / writing. I would rather not see the cable, which has to be twisted from the front back around the housing to plug it into the rear PS4 USB port. Depending on how you route the cable, you may not be able to see the light from certain angles if the cable blocks your line of sight. It's not a big deal, but it would be nicer if they had the drive activity light on the other side for a cleaner looking setup.The other down side, which doesn't bother me at all since I'm not planning to tear this thing apart and I haven't verified this info personally, is that according to youtube reviews the drive itself is not a standard 2.5" SATA laptop drive. The actual hard drive is a portable specific build with a different interface board, so you can't disassemble this bad boy and pop the drive into something else or use the enclosure with a different 2.5" HD.I've only had mine for a couple of months, but so far I have no complaints. It does everything I need with no perceivable penalty in performance. The extra storage space (5TB!) is a life saver since I had maxed out my PS4's internal drive, and it had already been upgraded to a 2TB drive. This is a much better option than cutting up the PS4's case to fit the height of a 4TB internal replacement. In addition, Sony did a nice job in making this approach a well supported option for expanding the PS4's storage capacity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Add extra capacity to your console
reviews.reviewText: The sleek black enclosure with the white letters makes this enclosure look rugged and near military style. The drive isn't rugged and shock proof, just appears that way. Small in size and light weight, this drive is portable. Their is not much bulk to the enclosure and the enclosure is not much larger than a 2.5inch HD. The drive is very quiet and is passively cooled, no loud fans spinning. There is a white LED on one end of the drive that indicates power and data transfer to the drive. The LED does fade in and out depending on what the drive is doing but will remain lit while powered. It is not adjustable in any way and does not have a way to disable. Just a personal preference, but I do like the LED and the overall look of the drive.They do include a USB cable that is less than 1 foot in length. I'm guessing to keep the data transfer speeds from being affected by longer cables. I have not replaced with a longer cable but it is an option. Not sure if it will affect performance.NO EXTRA POWER NEEDED! USB power is all that is needed. Only one cable needed with this drive. This means less wires to manage and less risk for dust or debris to get into the drive or ports.Set up was easy for the PS4, all I had to do was format through the settings after I connected the drive to the console.I use this external drive on my PS4 connected to the USB. My console still has the original HD internally, but I use this as my Extended Drive and where all of my games are installed. While I haven't done any testing or timing, the load times appear to be nearly the same as the OEM hard drive that was included with the system.The 5TB storage capacity has allowed me to install every PS4 game I own on disc and has allowed me for the first time to purchase digital copies of games. No more need to delete installed games and wait countless hours for them to re-install!!If you are wanting a mechanical HD for your gaming needs, I highly recommend this drive! I've purchased 2 for my home and really love them!

reviews.reviewTitle: Alternativa Super para respaldo de información o juegos dependiendo su uso
reviews.reviewText: Buena calidad, capacidad e imagen del disco duro. Visualmente atractivo.Funcionalidad y desempeño de 10
Me sirvió muchísimo, y es super fácil de usar

he Western Digital Black 4TB P10 Game Drive has proven to be a game-changer for my gaming experience on the PlayStation 4 (PS4). This portable external hard drive has seamlessly expanded my storage, allowing me to store and enjoy more games than ever before. Here's why I'm giving it a five-star review:First and foremost, the storage capacity is outstanding. With 4TB of space, this game drive offers a massive storage boost for your PS4. Whether you're a casual gamer or a hardcore enthusiast with an extensive game library, you'll appreciate the ample room to store games, downloadable content, and more. Say goodbye to the frustration of constantly deleting old games to make space for new ones.The compatibility with the PS4 is flawless. Setting up the P10 Game Drive is as simple as plugging it into one of the PS4's USB ports, and it's ready to go. You can effortlessly transfer games and applications between your console's internal storage and the external drive, giving you control over which games you want to keep readily accessible.The speed and performance of this drive are impressive. Games stored on the P10 Game Drive load just as quickly as if they were on the PS4's internal storage. You won't experience any lag or delays, ensuring a seamless gaming experience. This is especially important for fast-paced and graphics-intensive games.The build quality of the P10 Game Drive is top-notch. It feels robust and well-made, designed to withstand the demands of daily use. The sleek black design with the Western Digital logo adds a touch of style to your gaming setup.The portability of this drive is a significant advantage. It's compact and lightweight, making it easy to transport if you want to play your games on a friend's PS4 or simply take your gaming library with you. The drive is also compatible with other gaming consoles, including the Xbox One, making it a versatile choice for multi-platform gamers.In summary, the Western Digital Black 4TB P10 Game Drive is a must-have accessory for PS4 gamers who want to expand their storage and enjoy a vast gaming library without compromise. Its generous storage capacity, seamless compatibility, speed, and portability make it an unbeatable choice. Whether you're a solo gamer or part of a gaming household, this game drive ensures that you're always ready for your next gaming adventure. Five stars well-deserved! 🎮🕹️💫
